data.event: Spatial installation by Stefan Baumgaertner >>>>> The artist alters the c-base mainhall into a "vintage 3d wireframe" environment by ultraviolet illumination. Some say BOBBLESPACE was an experimental testrun in the framework of the mysterious c-base reconstruction project to identify the artefact's true geometry. > http://www.bobblespace.de
c-lab team >>>>> Spatial installation & experimental testrun
Spatial installation & live demonstrations

Doing Strange Things With Electricity >>>>> TALKAOKE (The People Speak, London); C-BASE 3D-PRINTER (c-lab team); SCREAM_PONG (libavg-Team);C-ROVE (Insp. Benone & Mars, c-base Open Moon Project); OpenDorks >>>>> Hosted by Yan "t." Minagawa >>>>> Access fee: EUR 5,00 (access free with CTM.10/transmediale.10 festival ticket)
The People Speak, London >>>>> > http://theps.net;
c-lab team >>>>> RepMan setup, installation & first testrun experiences;
libavg-Team >>>>> > http://www.libavg.de
Insp. Benone & Mars, c-base Open Moon Project >>>>>Moon Rover design & development > http://www.openmoon.info/
5 minutes lightning talks

PHUTURITY NOW! Special >>>>> Electronica, Krautrock, Synthesizer Jam Sessions - The weekly c-base jam session featuring PlayLive - an Ableton multi-touch user interface by hi-pi.de > http://www.openstage-berlin.de
Marco Kuhn >>>>> Presenting the Ableton user interface > http://hi-pi.de
Jam session
Special get-together of the Berlin Freifunk community at transmediale.10 > http://berlin.freifunk.net
Freifunk Talk (in German) >>>>> Future of WIFI in metropolises and the Status in Berlin
Talkshow (in German) >>>>> Yan t. Minagawa & Stephan Karpischek - The Future of mobile personal assistants
Side-event of PHUTURAMA - Symposium on Speculative, Fictious and Futuristic Design at the transmediale.10 Salon. > http://www.phuturama.de
c-base Open Moon Project presentation > http://www.openmoon.info
Access fee: EUR 5,00 (access free with CTM.10/transmediale.10 festival ticket)
